txt.en: You have discovered the shoulder of the Helgi Goblinbane statue in Hurmulkezer in the Flaming Deeps.\n\nThe goblins of Durin's Way destroyed the statue, and its parts can be found scattered throughout Moria. A dwarf named Uxi endeavours to reassemble this statue.
'Ah! What an excellent find, [placeholder]. Many of us are very interested in Uxi's efforts to reassemble this particular statue. I will have this piece sent to him at once.'
'I think the Orcs may have taken the statue piece to their camp at Hurmulkezer to the south of here.'
You have discovered the shoulder of the Helgi Goblinbane statue in Hurmulkezer in the Flaming Deeps.
Found the statue's shoulder and part of a head
The shoulder of the Helgi Goblinbane statue is in Hurmulkezer, a Ghâsh-hai camp to the south of Anazârmekhem in the Flaming Deeps.\n\nYou should collect the statue-piece for Uxi's collection.
Speak with Markthor at The Cross-roads of Ash
Markthor is at The Cross-roads of Ash, west of Hurmulkezer.\n\nMarkthor will want to know the statue's shoulder is safe, so that it can be sent to Uxi for reassembling.
